item.title: Cipher Team Composition Guide In Honkai Star Rail
item.description:
Cipher has two notable qualities that make her an important choice for every team in Honkai: Star Rail . She has a universal debuff that works as long as she’s on the field, and the ability to record and unleash True DMG. These qualities allow Cipher to fit into most teams, although she still doesn't outperform the best-in-slot support; rather, she'll be the second-best option. Therefore, it's recommended to get Cipher if players are lacking buffers and debuffers and are looking for a universal support. Here are some examples of the best Cipher team comps in HSR .

2 Cipher + Tribbie + Mydei + Hyacine

Since Cipher records a portion of the DMG done to enemies, what better than to team her with broken AoE characters that never stop attacking. Mydei just passively plays and punishes every enemy that dares to land a hit on him. This playstyle works with Cipher as Mydei will attract most of the attacks while she debuffs enemies for him to deal even more DMG.

On the other hand, Tribbie and Hyacine are both support units who will keep sending AoE attacks on enemies that, surprisingly, deal a lot of DMG. Tribbie can buff her team’s DMG against all enemies, while Hyacine has incredible sustain and healing abilities. All three units will significantly build up Cipher’s recorded True DMG and get her ready to delete an enemy every few turns. Additionally, Mydei, Tribbie, and Hyacine can easily carry themselves and clear stages, especially with the buff Cipher grants them.

As long as Tribbie and Hyacine are in this Cipher team, players can replace Mydei with some DPS units that may be slightly better or worse. It all comes down to the characters’ builds. Castorice and Aglaea are both strong DPS units who can constantly deal a lot of AoE DMG and can take Mydei’s place.

1 Cipher + Acheron + Jiaoqiu + Aventurine

Since E0 Acheron needs two Nihility characters in her team, Cipher and Jiaoqiu can take this task. Both of them greatly increase her DMG while they act as a battery for her Ultimate. Cipher can’t 100% apply a debuff on each attack, but with the right Light Cone, she can. As for Jiaoqiu, it’s the easiest job for him as he DoT enemies whatever he does.

This synergy helps Cipher record a lot of True DMG, getting ready for her Ultimate. Once the team clears all the monsters and minions around the boss, players can unleash Cipher’s recorded True DMG and delete the HSR boss. If Acheron is on her E2, it’s better to build the team with a Harmony unit like Sparkle. Cipher can still work, but not as effectively as some other characters, and she can’t do for Acheron what Jiaoqiu does. She’s only viable if players don’t have a replacement. As for Aventurine , this team still needs a sustain that can debuff enemies. So, adding Aventurine or Gallagher is necessary.

item.title: Splitgate 2: 7 Best Weapons, Ranked
item.description:
Summary

  • Splitgate 2 classes have unique abilities and weapons, promoting class-switching based on game mode.
  • Goliath, a Sabrask weapon, offers powerful long-range shots resembling Destiny 2 hand cannons.
  • Meridian's Hyperline excels in battle royale with high fire rate, while Quantum is ideal for long-range gunfights.

With Splitgate 2 introducing a class system, the gameplay has changed a little bit compared to the original game. The classes offer unique abilities and access to different weapons, although the weapon categories are shared among all of them. However, there is a difference between the shotgun for Aeros and the shotgun for Meridian, for example.

This takes the balancing to a new level. So, maybe one class features a better ability, but comes with mediocre weapons. That will force players to avoid sticking to one class and switch between them based on the game mode. However, a weapon tier list is always valid, especially in a game mode like battle royale, where every class has access to every weapon.

7 Goliath

A Reliable Secondary For Landing Powerful Shots

The heavy pistol for Sabrask packs a strong punch and is a good option for players to target enemies from afar, especially when running with a shotgun. The fire rate is not decent, but the damage output is pretty impressive. For players with Destiny 2 experience, Goliath will feel like an epic Hand Cannon.

Unfortunately, there is no Extended Magazine option in the attachments for Goliath to increase its 6-round magazine size, but players can use Laser Sight and Barrel Extension to increase the range and accuracy of the weapon. Using the Ammo Now perk on Sabrask can also help more with the reload speed of the weapon.

6 Sprinter

Not The Best Option But Still The Most Reliable SMG

The name of the weapon fits well into its role for the Aeros players. It's far better than the SMGs that Meridian or Sabrask classes are equipped with. Not only is the fire rate decent, but the recoil of the Sprinter is also mild and controllable.

Using weapon attachments like Barrel Extension can help with the Sprinter's range. Extended Magazine can also help with fewer reloads, though the bullets are quite weak, and probably more than half a magazine would be required to kill opponents without hitting heads.

5 Hyperline

Best Carbine For Long-Range Gunfights In Battle Royale

The carbine for Meridian is the one with the highest fire rate, and honestly, that's an important factor in carbines. None of the carbines will one-shot the enemies, so the faster fire rate can help significantly with finishing off the opponent before they can find cover.

Since Hyperline is a long-range weapon, it excels at battle royale gunfights. So, this is the one weapon players need to look for higher rarity variants of while scavenging the chests in battle royale. It might not have the range of a Burst Rifle, but using Barrel Extension and Rapid Fire attachments will make it a deadlier weapon.

4 Quantum

Fast-Firing Burst Rifle With Maximum Range

The Burst Rifle for Meridian is quite easy to use. It shoots three bullets in rapid succession, and the range is also pretty good for the weapon, making it ideal for hunting opponents from afar in battle royale matches. Having either a Burst Rifle or a Carbine is highly recommended for battle royale builds, and Quantum is the best Burst Rifle among all of them.

It doesn't have the highest damage output, but it shoots three bullets, while Sabrask's Burst Rifle shoots only two. Using Rapid Fire and Bullet Burst increases the fire rate for Quantum even more. However, the weapon isn't really a considerable option for Arenas.

3 Synapse

A Combination Of High Fire Rate And Colossal Magazine Size

Assault Rifles exist in almost every standard shooter, and they usually deliver balanced performance between fire rate and damage output. Synapse is the fastest-firing assault rifle in Splitgate 2, though it sacrifices damage output for that.

Since the weapon shoots more rounds per second, it also comes with a 40-round magazine, which is a massive plus for Meridian players as they will need fewer reloads. Now, if the players use the Extended Magazine attachment, the bullet count per magazine goes up to 50 rounds, and that makes Meridians unstoppable in Arenas.

2 Trailblazer

The Strongest Assault Rifle For Those With Perfect Aim

What makes Trailblazer the best Assault Rifle in Splitgate 2 is its massive damage output and decent fire rate. Trailblazer has the lowest fire rate among weapons of its category, but using the Rapid Fire attachment will increase its fire rate by one unit, making it equal to that of Tempo.

Synapse still comes with a higher rate, but when the damage output is high, the player can do more with fewer bullets. So, Trailblazer is a much better choice for players who trust in their aim, while Synapse provides more room for mistakes and is suitable for casuals.

1 Blitz

A Flawless Weapon Created For Run And Gun

By far, Blitz is the best shotgun in Splitgate 2 , coming with the fastest fire rate among all weapons of the same category. It suits an Aeros player well, and it also gets the job done quickly for those with a good enough aim.

The faster fire rate of Blitz makes it ideal for run and gun in Arena modes. And when it's combined with the speed of Aeros, along with some weapon attachments like Knuckles and Barrel Extension, Blitz unleashes its true power.

6 Images
6 Images

item.title: Where to Find the Seventh Trial of Aql in Dune: Awakening
item.description:
The Seventh Trial of Aql will take players deep underground in Dune: Awakening , and while the last trial offered nothing but a ruined shrine and disappointment, this one contains a traditional Spice Dream segment for players to experience.

Much like the previous Trials of Aql, the Spice segment in the seventh trial isn't much of a challenge, though players are sure to have problems actually finding the trial in the first place. This guide covers the location of the Seventh Trial of Aql, including a rundown on the Spice Dream and the rewards you get for completing it.

Dune: Awakening - Seventh Trial of Aql Location

The Seventh Trial of Aql is located at the bottom of the Hagga Rift , which is the gigantic chasm spanning several kilometers along central/northern part of the map. Pinning the trial's location on the map is a little tricky since the Rift has multiple levels — just know that it's at the very bottom .

Jump or drive down the bottom of the Hagga Rift and go to the general area pinned on the maps above. What you're looking for is a cave called the Red Maw , and as its name suggests, it's a cave that's glowing red. Enter the cave and explore it to find some hostile NPCs and some chests full of loot. Then, go back to the entrance and look to your left to find a ledge that leads to the altar.

There are multiple ways to avoid fall damage, so consider launching yourself down the chasm to get there faster.

The Spice Dream Segment

The dream segment here is pretty straightforward — sandstorms will roll through the area as you're traversing, and if you don't take cover, you'll get sent back to the closest checkpoint. To avoid getting set back, enter the Stilltents placed along the path. Continue this process of moving forward and hiding in Stilltents until the dream is complete.

Rewards

Once you wake from the dream, you'll unlock the crafting schematic for the Stilltent, a portable shelter that you can place in most areas of the map. These can be crafted using the following materials:

  • 100 Water
  • 7 Steel Ingot
  • 18 Micro-sandwich Fiber
  • 14 Silicone Block

Apart from sheltering you from the heat and sandstorms, Stilltents can also rehydrate with the water that it captures and preserves. It's not exactly a terrific way to get water in Dune: Awakening , but it's definitely useful for when you find yourself thirsty with no other source of hydration in sight. Just keep in mind that these tents aren't meant to replace bases or outposts.

Dune: Awakening
8.8 /10
Released
June 10, 2025

item.title: Marvel Rivals Players Are Asking Netease for a Specific Skin Set
item.description:
Summary

  • Marvel Rivals players request disco-inspired skins for a wide variety of characters.
  • Future Foundation skins for The Fantastic Four are coming to the shop on June 12.
  • NetEase Games is also bringing back rare skins, like Captain America's Galactic Talon Bundle.

Marvel Rivals players have come together to ask NetEase Games to add a set of disco-inspired skins for numerous characters in the popular hero shooter. NetEase Games recently released its major Season 2.5 update for Marvel Rivals , which added a new convoy map of the location Arakko to the title.

Many fans of The Fantastic Four have expressed enthusiasm over the upcoming Future Foundation skins in Marvel Rivals . While gamers can claim Mister Fantastic's Future Foundation costume by progressing the Combat Chest for Season 2.5, The Thing and Invisible Woman will be receiving their skins in the hero shooter's shop on June 12 at 7 PM PDT. As of writing, NetEase Games hasn't officially announced just how much the new cosmetics will cost. A lot of people are also waiting to see when Spider-Man will receive his Future Foundation costume, as he can be seen wearing the outfit as he swings around in the background of The Fantastic Four's collective MVP animation.

In a recent post on Reddit, The_Duke_of_Gloom shared images of disco-inspired costumes for some of Marvel's most iconic characters, requesting that NetEase Games release similar skins in the popular hero shooter. Several people followed up by posting their own images of disco-inspired costumes that have appeared in Marvel's comics over the years. Some players commented that they would love to see Marvel Rivals ' Spider-Man receive the costume shown off in the images, as it would make him look like a moving disco ball.

Marvel Rivals Players Want Disco Skins

NetEase Games is no stranger to releasing themed skins, as it recently debuted several "Sunshine" costumes for heroes like Rocket Raccoon, Squirrel Girl, and Jeff the Land Shark in Marvel Rivals . Each of the "Sunshine" skins shows heroes wearing beach attire, making for a definitive summer look. Many people have been quite amused by the description of Jeff's Sunshine Land Shark skin, as it contains a message from Mister Fantastic chastising The Thing for sending random messages to The Fantastic Four's emergency channel. As it turns out, Jeff the Land Shark was likely sending the coded texts.

Gamers looking to get their hands on more cosmetics may be pleased to learn that NetEase Games will be bringing some of Marvel Rivals ' rarest skins back to the shop on June 12 at 7 PM PDT. The offerings include Captain America's Galactic Talon Bundle and Hawkeye's Galactic Fangs bundle. Players will also see several holiday skins make their return, but all of these rare costumes will only be available for one week. With so much content to enjoy and even more on the way, many fans are feeling optimistic about the future of Marvel Rivals .

10 Images

item.title: Roblox: Anime Rails Codes (June 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Anime Rails Codes
  • How to Redeem Anime Rails Codes
  • How to Get More Anime Rails Codes

Anime Rails is a representative of the survival genre, in which players have to travel through the wastelands. On your way, you will encounter various buildings and enemies, from which you will take both valuable and junk items. To effectively progress in the runs, you should use Anime Rails codes.

As expected from Roblox codes, they contain various free goodies. Among the rewards, you will find various amounts of Cash that will be useful to you for obtaining new classes. However, you should hurry, as their validity period is limited.

Updated June 11, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Anime Rails devs just dropped three fresh freebies for you to enjoy. Alongside earlier rewards, these new additions offer a nice boost to enhance your journey. These bonuses can help you progress a bit faster and add variety to your experience. Be sure to check back soon - more rewards could arrive as the game expands.

All Anime Rails Codes

Working Anime Rails Codes

  • 3MVISITS – Redeem this code to get free rewards (NEW)
  • 2MVISITS – Redeem this code to get free rewards (NEW)
  • 40kLikes – Redeem this code to get free rewards (NEW)
  • NIGHTMARE – Redeem this code to get free rewards
  • 3000CCU – Redeem this code to get free rewards
  • TONY – Redeem this code to get free rewards

Expired Anime Rails Codes

  • SORRYFORBUG
  • 1000CCU
  • 1MVISITS
  • NARU
  • 10kLikes
  • 7KLIKES
  • PIRATE
  • THANKS
  • NEWHUB
  • 1000LIKES
  • 1500LIKES
  • 4000LIKES
  • 2500LIKES
  • BATTLEROYAL
  • JJK
  • 100LIKES
  • QUEST
  • 200LIKES

The main task of players in Anime Rails is to survive in the wasteland. To do this, you need to find items for sale as well as food for your dragon. If this creature is hungry, you will not be able to move on and will most likely end the run. Fortunately, the game has different classes that differ not only in stats but also in starting items. To get them, you will have to spend quite a lot of Cash, which can be earned using Anime Rails codes.

You only need a few codes to get more than 200 Cash. However, it is worth noting that this method has one limitation, namely, a temporary one. Each code added to the game expires after a certain time after its release. Therefore, we do not recommend that you delay their redemption.

How to Redeem Anime Rails Codes

Using Anime Rails codes is no different from most other Roblox games. This feature is available to players from the first minutes of the game, even before they start the first run. But to get rewards, you will first have to join the developers' Roblox group. Once you've done that, follow these simple steps:

  • Launch Anime Rails .
  • Then, click on the Codes button on the left side of the screen.
  • Next, enter the code in the new window and hit enter to claim the rewards.

How to Get More Anime Rails Codes

As with other Roblox experiences, Anime Rails gets new Roblox codes as players reach various combo milestones. So you should visit the official social media pages of the developers, where you will find all the news, including codes, first-hand:

  • Jawad2652 Roblox group
  • Anime Rails Discord server
